exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y x : X y : Y H : exists2 R : relation2 X Y, expansion1 TX TY R /\\ simulation TY TX (trans R) & R x y Unable to unify "exists2 R : relation2 X Y, expansion1 TX TY R /\\ simulation TY TX (trans R) & R x y" with "union_st wexpansion x y".

original: unfold incl, expand, wexpand. intros x y H. unfold expansion, union_st in H. apply H.
